concept.title: Compression
concept.shortdesc: You can use Gzip, Bzip2, Snappy, and LZO compression with the Local FS destination. To use LZO compression with the destination, you need to configure the to enable LZO compression.

conbody.p: Local FS destinationcompressioncompressionfor the Local FS destinationThe other compression formats do not require additional configuration.

Due to JVM limitations, you can use LZO compression with either the Local FS destination or the Hadoop FS destination. You cannot use LZO compression with both destinations. Doc reminder-Make sure updates in this topic get into the Hadoop FS version.
